title: Mandarin Turkey with Bean Sprout and Watercress Salad
ingredients: ['4 turkey breast steaks, about 140g each', '2 tbsp chopped fresh rosemary', '1 tsp crushed chilli flakes', '1 tbsp coriander seeds, coarsely crushed', '2 tbsp olive oil', '4 mandarin oranges', '400g bean sprouts', '75g watercress', '8 spring onions, sliced', '4 tsp sugar', '8 tbsp mayonnaise', 'cayenne pepper (optional)']
